body:
## If you're waiting for the defendant to respond

The defendant must respond to your claim by 4pm on the day specified. 

[Sign in to the 'Money claims' service](https://www.moneyclaims.service.gov.uk) to see their response, or if they have asked for extra time to respond (this can be up to 14 days).

You'll need your email address and the password you created when you created your account. You can [request a new password](https://hmcts-access.service.gov.uk/reset/forgotpassword) if you need to.

## If you've applied for judgement

You'll get a judgement letter telling you the outcome and what to do next. This information won't be available through the 'Money claims' service.
